name: Crashy Cars
description:
This project is a Easy customizable project work well with every unity version and ready for mobile devices to run easily.

REQUEST :

this project need yours's supervision and dream to get converted into a fun ,charming and enjoyable games .

Thank you , reconsidered us 

FEATURES:
- Addictive one-touch gameplay.
- 30 built-in characters with cute blocky style.
- Daily reward system.
- All assets (sounds, fonts, models, sprites, etc.) are free for commercial use.
- Easy to customize.
- Optimized for iOS and Android.
- Fully commented C#.
- Detailed documentation.
